name: Survival: Fountain of Youth
storyline: You are a member of Juan Ponce de Leon's expedition in search of the Fountain of Youth, based on an actual historic event of the Age of Discovery. After surviving a shipwreck, you need to learn to live on an uninhabited island: hunt, gather and manage resources, build shelters, discover new technologies, develop skills, resist diseases, cope with weather conditions, fight predators, and much more. Your main goal is to Survive. Your secondary goals are to figure out the fate of an extinct Indian civilization and to look for your shipwrecked crew, explore the islands, and maybe find the Fountain of Youth.
summary: Survival: Fountain of Youth is a challenging single-player survival game set up on a vast Caribbean archipelago. You play as a stranded 16th century sailor having to craft his way through the struggles of survival in order to unveil the mysteries of an ancient civilization and your own fate.
